content:
Here are three bands that are representative of 70s classic rock:

1. Led Zeppelin: Formed in 1968, Led Zeppelin is considered one of the most influential and successful bands in the history of rock music. Known for their powerful sound, which combined blues, folk, and hard rock elements, the band released numerous classic albums during the 1970s, such as Led Zeppelin IV (1971) and Physical Graffiti (1975). Their iconic songs, like "Stairway to Heaven," "Whole Lotta Love," and "Kashmir," are staples of the classic rock genre.
